text: Anton Vanko defects to the United States to develop Arc Reactor technology with Howard Stark in what was known as 'The Unity Project'.President John F. Kennedy is assassinated in Dallas, Texas, and Vice President Lyndon B. Johnson takes his place.Stark World Exposition is held in conjunction with the World's Fair at Flushing Meadows, New York City.Trevor Slattery performs his first role as Boatswain #1 in William Shakespeare's play The Tempest.Anton VankoÂ is accused of espionage and deported as a spy. Howard Stark takes full credit for the Arc Reactor technology andÂ Obadiah Stane convinces him to take Stark Industries back into weapons development.
title: 1960s
